After a hiatus, this blog is back online and has a new home as part of the [danieljsmith.org](https://danieljsmith.org) site family.

## What's New

- **New domain**: The blog now lives at [blog.danieljsmith.org](https://blog.danieljsmith.org)
- **Fresh design**: An amber/orange theme to distinguish it from the other sites
- **Part of a family**: Join the [tuition](https://tuition.danieljsmith.org) and [resources](https://resources.danieljsmith.org) sites under the main danieljsmith.org umbrella

## Legacy Posts

All posts from 2023-2024 have been preserved and tagged with the **Legacy** category. These cover:

- **Boltzmann Transport Equation** series (bte) - My undergraduate research on kinetic theory
- **Emmanuel House** series (eh) - Data analysis projects for a local charity
- **Neural Networks from Scratch** series (ng) - Building neural networks with NumPy and TensorFlow
- **Kaggle/ML** competitions (k) - Machine learning competition entries
- **STEP solutions** (ste) - Worked solutions for A-Level students
- **YouTube-inspired projects** (yt) - Following along with ML tutorials

## What's Next

More posts coming soon on mathematics, machine learning, and whatever else catches my interest.
